content: Hi John, Is XDCPM applicable? In it’s simplest form, XDCPM expresses any project management network as a table of paths, with highest priority paths to the left. Each color and priority is clearly established, so that if two people seek the same resource, it’s clear which has priority. Essentially, XDCPM takes the human interpretation part out of the post-it style Kanban/project-management board.
